price: 4. Kaadu diggah usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) lawcal macfuuz addal yan, Ni-garil naharsi ambiyal obte kitoobak muxxo-leeh, fayyayaah gufti taafe cikmat-le.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu fī ummi al-kitābi ladaynā laʿaliyyun ḥakīmun
